channel.title: Velociraptor Artifact Exchange
channel.description: Recent content in Artifact Exchange on Velociraptor - Digging deeper!

item.title: Windows.EventLogs.RDPClientActivity
item.description: This artifact retrieves outgoing RDP session activity from the Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-RDPClient event logs. It aggregates sessions based on ActivityID and outputs hostname, timeframe and disconnect reasons. Disconnect reason is filled using a dict that was filled using MS Docs (see references)

item.title: Custom.Windows.Office.MRU
item.description: This artifact enables hunting for recently used Office Documents.

item.title: MacOS.Applications.Safari.History
item.description: Parses Safari history database

item.title: Windows.Carving.IcedID
item.description: This artifact yara-scans memory or unpacked DLL samples for IcedID trojan (also known as BokBot, or Anubis) detections, finds, decodes and returns the Campaign ID and C2 configurations.

item.title: Windows.System.PowerEfficiencyDiagnostics
item.description: This artifact parses the XML Energy Reports from the Power Efficiency Diagnostics feature of Windows, returning the processes which had high CPU usage, including which

item.title: Windows.Registry.BackupRestore
item.description: This artifact will return BackupRestore configuration.

item.title: Windows.Detection.BinaryHunter
item.description: This artifact enables hunting for binary attributes.

item.title: Windows.Registry.HiddenUsers
item.description: Find hidden user accounts through registry values on the filesystem.

item.title: Windows.EventLogs.CondensedAccountUsage
item.description: This artifact will extract condensed information on logon / logoff events.

item.title: MacOS.System.LocationServices
item.description: This artifact looks for applications that are registered and allowed for use of location services by checking the plist file in `/var/db/locationd/clients.plist`. This can be useful to help determine if these settings have been modified by an attacker to perform location tracking.

item.title: Linux.Detection.CVE20214034
item.description: This artifact lists processes running as root that were spawns by processes that are not running as root. This kind of behavior is normal for things like sudo or su but for other processes (especially /bin/bash) it could represent a process launched via CVE-2021-4034.

item.title: Windows.Applications.DefenderDHParser
item.description: This artifact leverages Windows Defender DetectionHistory tool to parse and return the parameters of Windows Defender detections contained in Detection History files.

item.title: Windows.System.WMIProviders
item.description: List the WMI providers in the system.

item.title: Windows.ETW.WMIEventing
item.description: This artifact collects events associated with creation and deletion of WMI Event Consumers. All Event Consumers created under any namespace will generate events which are filtered on event consumer classes.

item.title: Linux.Carving.SSHLogs
item.description: Linux systems typically store audit events in syslog. In particular successful ssh logins are especially important for some investigations.

item.title: Linux.Sysinternals.SysmonEvent
item.description: Parses syslog for Sysmon events on Linux using a unix domain socket.

item.title: Windows.Registry.AteraNetworks
item.description: Find AteraNetworks configuration details in the registry. This artifact is best combined with Windows.Forensics.FilenameSearch searching for the string "atera".

item.title: Exchange.Label.User
item.description: This artifact watches for new client enrolments and automatically label the client with the required label if the user exists.

item.title: Generic.Detection.LunasecLog4shell
item.description: Uses the Log4Shell scanner of Lunasec to scan the file systems of all drives of the host for any sign of vulnerabilities related to Log4shell

item.title: Server.Slack.Clients.Enrolled
item.description: Send a message to slack when clients become enrolled.

item.title: Windows.System.AccessControlList
item.description: This artifact displays the access control lists of files.

item.title: Windows.Detection.ProxyLogon.ProxyShell
item.description: This artifact hunts for CVE-2021-27065 (Microsoft Exchange ProxyLogon RCE) and CVE-2021-31207 (Microsoft Exchange ProxyShell RCE) exploitation by parsing entries in the 'MSExchange Management.evtx' log.

item.title: Windows.Registry.CapabilityAccessManager
item.description: The ConsentStore in CapabilityAccessManager can provide insight to what resources binaries have had access to, such as the microphone and webcam. This artefact returns non-Microsoft executables (ie: entries listed in the `NonPackaged` path).

item.title: Generic.Detection.Log4jVulnHunter
item.description: This artifact searches for Vulnerable log4j libraries.

item.title: Generic.Detection.log4jRCE
item.description: Detection for exploitation attempts against log4j RCE vulnerability CVE-2021-44228.

item.title: Splunk.Events.Clients
item.description: This server monitoring artifact will watch a selection of client monitoring artifacts for new events and push those to a splunk index.

item.title: Windows.Carving.Hancitor
item.description: This artifact yara-scans memory or unpacked DLL samples for Hancitor trojan detections, decrypting and returning the Build ID and C2 list.

item.title: Windows.Monitor.USBPlugIn
item.description: Monitor for plug in of USB volume. Output drive letter for additional enrichment artifacts

item.title: Windows.Detection.USBYara
item.description: Run yara over usb when USB is plugged into machine. Return context and hit details.

item.title: Windows.EventLogs.Zircolite
item.description: Zircolite is a standalone tool that can be used to apply Sigma rules to EVTX files on endpoints in an effort to quickly parse large datasets and surface detections. You can read more about Zircolite below: https://github.com/wagga40/Zircolite This artifact currently supports usage of the built-in rulesets. Support for custom ruleset usage will be added in the future. NOTE: This artifact may take several minutes to run, depending on the size of EVTX files being analyzed.

item.title: Server.Findflows
item.description: This artifact enables searching over client flow results with regex and returns a link to the Flow for followup.

item.title: Windows.Carving.Emotet
item.description: This artifact yara-scans memory or unpacked DLL samples for the new 2021 Emotet detections, decrypts and returns the C2 list.

item.title: Linux.Collection.CatScale
item.description: This is a simple artifact that leverages Cat-Scale to collect many different artifacts from a Linux host, then uploads the results to the Velociraptor server.

item.title: Windows.Applications.DIEC
item.description: Execute DetectItEasy (console version) on specified paths and return rows of results to hunt/filter on binaries based types of files (E.g.: Packed binaries and its packers)

item.title: Windows.AttackSimulation.AtomicRedTeam
item.description: This artifact allows you to run Atomic Red Team tests on Windows endpoints using Invoke-AtomicRedTeam. Linux and MacOS endpoints will soon be supported.

item.title: Linux.Sysinternals.Sysmon
item.description: Parses syslog for Sysmon events on Linux

item.title: Windows.Carving.Qbot
item.description: This artifact yara-scans memory or unpacked DLL samples for Qbot (or Qakbot) detections, decrypts and returns the botnet and C2 configurations.

item.title: Server.Analysis.CyberChefServer
item.description: Analyze/transform data with CyberChef-server.

item.title: Windows.Carving.SquirrelWaffle
item.description: This artifact yara-scans memory or process dumps for unpacked SquirrelWaffle Dlls, decodes the configuration and returns the C2s and the payload.

item.title: Windows.Binary.Exports
item.description: This artifact can be used to extract all binary exports to research potential lolbins. Selecting the AllBinaryInfo tickbox will return complete Binary information.

item.title: Windows.Applications.Cylance
item.description: Parse Cylance logs.

item.title: Windows.Applications.OfficeMacros.MacroRaptor
item.description: This artifact implements OleTools MacroRaptor capability in VQL.

item.title: Windows.Bulk.File
item.description: Search for some simple bulk File IOCs and upload if desired. Typical upload workflow may be to firstly search, then if returned rows match expectations rerun query with upload tickbox selected.

item.title: Windows.System.BinaryVersion
item.description: Extract the binary version information for binary files. This artifact will search the MFT for any matching filenames and return binary information.

item.title: Windows.EventLogs.Telerik
item.description: This Artifact will hunt for evidence of Telerik exploitation in the Application Event Log.

item.title: Windows.Analysis.Capa
item.description: Analyze PE, ELF, or shellcode files with capa.

item.title: Windows.Applications.OfficeServerCache
item.description: Return Office Internet Server Cache Registry keys and values in order to identify possible C2 URLs from malicious opened Office documents.

item.title: Linux.Applications.WgetHSTS
item.description: Wget creates a HSTS log file in a user's home directory. This can contain forensically relevant informtion.

item.title: Windows.EventLogs.RecordIDCheck
item.description: This artifact will compare EventLog records and report on abnormalities in RecordID sequence and optional time gap. The artifact can be used for both hunting, remote or local analysis.

item.title: Windows.Registry.CVE_2021_40444
item.description: This artifact will enable both application and removal of the reccomended mitigation for CVE-2021-40444.
